title: Corki Idea
body: Can you please rename "Fnatic Corki" to "Bathtub Corki" as it is more fitting for the skin

replies.body: yeah but who would buy "Bathtub corki" it sounds pathetic for a skin, Fnatic Corki is more of a skin name. (my thoughts on the skin name, not 100% correct)
Bathtub Corki sounds relaxing, better than Fnatic Corki.
Yes please. I got Fnatic Corki in a mystery skin yesterday
